content.text:
# Minister of Agriculture, Forestry and Fisheries (Japan)

| First =
| last =
| abolished =
| succession =
| abbreviation =
| unofficial_names =
| deputy = State Minister of Agriculture
| salary = ¥20,916,000
| website =
}}
The  is a member of the Cabinet of Japan and is the leader and chief executive of the Ministry of Agriculture, Forestry and Fisheries. The minister is nominated by the Prime Minister of Japan and is appointed by the Emperor of Japan.
The current minister is Norikazu Suzuki, who took office on 21 October 2025.
